alert.note: Alert for Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:39AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Scott and Polk Counties through 915 AM CST... At 838 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Mountain Fork to 8 miles west of Vandervoort to 13 miles northeast of Broken Bow. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mena... Wickes... Grannis... Hatfield... Vandervoort... Beauchamp... Cossatot River State Park... Mountain Fork... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Mccauley... Hartley... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Cove... Acorn... Ink... Hatton... Potter... Dallas... Shady Grove... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations
